patterns: What types of courses are available?
Tell me about the courses
What courses do you offer?
responses: Raja-Rani Coaching offers diverse sewing courses from basic stitching to advanced garment making. We also provide specialized workshops in katori blouse design, western wear, and kid's apparel.
Our courses cover a wide range, including basic stitching, advanced garment making, and specialized workshops like katori blouse design, western wear, and kid's apparel.

patterns: What are the prices of the courses?
How much do the courses cost?
Are there any discounts available?
responses: The price of our courses varies depending on the level and duration. Could you please specify which course you're interested in, so I can provide you with the accurate pricing details?
Our course prices vary based on factors like level, duration, and any ongoing promotions. Please specify the course you're interested in for detailed pricing information.

patterns: How long do the courses last?
What is the duration of the courses?
How much time do I need to complete a course?
responses: Our courses vary in duration. Basic courses typically last a few weeks, while advanced courses may span several months. For specific durations, please specify the course you're interested in.
The duration of our courses varies depending on the complexity and level. Some courses may last a few weeks, while others may take several months to complete.

patterns: How do I register for a course?
What is the registration process?
Where can I enroll in a course?
responses: Registration options include our website or direct contact via phone or email. Details are available on our course pages.
To register for a course, you can visit our website or contact us directly through phone or email. Our team will guide you through the registration process.

patterns: Are there any prerequisites for enrolling in advanced courses?
What skills do I need for advanced courses?
Do I need sewing experience for advanced courses?
responses: Some advanced courses may require basic sewing skills. We recommend checking the specific course requirements before enrolling.
While some advanced courses may have prerequisites like basic sewing skills, others may be suitable for beginners. Please review the course descriptions for detailed requirements.

patterns: Do I get a certificate upon course completion?
Are certificates provided after finishing a course?
Can I receive a certificate?
responses: Yes, upon successful completion of our courses, we provide certificates to acknowledge your achievement.
Certificates are awarded upon successful completion of our courses, validating your skills and expertise.

patterns: Is there support available after completing a course?
How can I get help after finishing a course?
Do you offer post-course support?
responses: Yes, we offer post-course support. Students can reach out via WhatsApp for any queries or join our live doubt-clearing sessions.
Our support doesn't end with the course completion. You can access post-course support via WhatsApp or participate in our live doubt-clearing sessions.

patterns: Do courses include live sessions or workshops?
Are there any interactive sessions in the courses?
Can I participate in live workshops?
responses: Yes, some of our courses include live sessions or workshops to enhance the learning experience.
Live sessions and workshops are available in select courses, providing interactive learning opportunities.

patterns: Can I access course materials on multiple devices?
Is the platform accessible from different devices?
Can I use the app on my phone and computer?
responses: Yes, you can access course materials on multiple devices. Simply log in with your account credentials, and you'll have access across all your devices.
Our platform is designed for multi-device access, allowing you to learn seamlessly across different devices.

patterns: Tell me more about Raja-Rani Coaching courses
What can I expect from your courses?
Give me details about the courses
responses: In our hands-on classes, you'll learn essential techniques and gain the confidence to turn your creative visions into reality.
Our courses offer a comprehensive learning experience, covering everything from basic stitching to advanced garment making.

patterns: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
Are there any special offers available?
Can I get a discount on course fees?
responses: Occasional discounts and special promotions are available. Stay updated by following us on social media or subscribing to our newsletter.
We regularly offer discounts and special promotions on our courses. Follow us on social media or subscribe to our newsletter to stay informed.
